name: Nimbus Notes - Updated UI
description: This is my personal stylesheet that I use with Nimbus Notes.  Note: I only use the dark mode and this stylesheet only has inputs for the Nimbus notes Dark Mode.  If you use the light mode, the I would imagine that the colors will be off.
additional_info:
PRIMARY ENHANCEMENTS MADE WITH THIS CSS. 

1) DARKS have been made darker so that it's easier to read (to me)

2) FOLDER SIDEBAR + FILE SIDEBAR: 

  - My favorite sidebar in any app, is the "sheet sidebar" in the Mac app Ulysses. I've made the Nimbus Notes Sidebar look as close as possible to the Ulysses sidebar.  Cleaner, I think.
  - NOTE: In your Nimbus file sidebar (the middle one), make sure that the "NOTE LIST" is set to "comfortable".  (Do this by, clicking the downward facing arrow at the top of the File sidebar which 

3) EDITOR 

- Paragraph spacing has been edited.
- Font sizes have been edited for all three document types: small, medium, and large. 
- LINKS are wrapped with a background - so that it's easier to tell that they're links.
- SOME LINKS, that contain GitHub, YouTube, Facebook, and Drive.google.com, have icons to the left of the links that indicate the destination of the link.
- WIKI LINKS - have a cool animation
- IMAGES captions and file captions float over the images

4) COLUMNS (which, to me, is the coolest feature of Nimbus Notes)

- Spacing around columns has been decreased. 

And much more... 

If you like it (or hate it), the only thing I ask is that you leave a comment.
